rules_text:
Nourish 2 [i](When this creature enters, put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two colorless Food artifact tokens with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
At the beginning of combat on your turn, each noncreature Food you control becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness X/X until end of turn, where X is Urnis, Battlechef Exemplar’s power.
rules_text2:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Essence of Life: You gain 3 life.
When you sacrifice Essence of Life, search your library for a creature or Food card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
notes:
Changed names, added art, added flavor text
Front: +human, +wizard, 5MV 5/5 —> 4MV 1/1
Reworked front
+Legendary backside
Reworked back
